text: 2016–17 Polish Cup is the 60th edition of the Polish Cup of men's volleyball tournament. As a venue for final tournament was chosen Centennial Hall in Wrocław. On January 15, 2017 ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle achieved 6th Polish Cup in history after beating defender of title PGE Skra Bełchatów. 5 of 7 individual awards went to ZAKSA's players. Dawid Konarski from ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle was awarded Most Valuable Player. ==Final phase== ===Round of 16=== |} ===Quarterfinals=== |} ==Final four== * Venue: Centennial Hall, Wrocław * All times are Central European Time (UTC+01:00). ===Semifinals=== |} ===Final=== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2017 Polish Super Cup |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- | |align=left|PGE Skra Bełchatów |- |Semifinalists |align=left|Lotos Trefl Gdańsk Jastrzębski Węgiel |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2017 Polish Cup Winner |- |ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle 6th title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Paweł Zatorski, Kévin Tillie, Dominik Witczak, Dawid Konarski, Rafał Buszek, Łukasz Wiśniewski, Mateusz Bieniek, Bartosz Jastrowicz, Grzegorz Bociek, Kamil Semeniuk, Grzegorz Pająk, Sam Deroo, Benjamin Toniutti (c), Aleksander Maziarz, Korneliusz Banach, Patryk Czarnowski |- |Head Coach |- |Ferdinando De Giorgi |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player : Dawid Konarski (ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle) *Best Server : Artur Szalpuk (PGE Skra Bełchatów) *Best Receiver : Kevin Tillie (ZAKSA Kędzierzyn- Koźle) *Best Defender : Robert Milczarek (PGE Skra Bełchatów) *Best Blocker : Łukasz Wiśniewski (ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle) *Best Opposite : Dawid Konarski (ZAKSA Kędzierzyn-Koźle) *Best Setter : Benjamin Toniutti (ZAKSA Kędzierzyn- Koźle) ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:2016 in volleyball Polish Cup of men's volleyball Category:Volleyball competitions in Poland
title: 2016–17 Polish Cup of men's volleyball
